const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); const Results = (props) => { return ( {props.data.map((yearData) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{yearData.year} {formatter.format(yearData.savingsEndOfYear)} {formatter.format(yearData.yearlyInterest)} formatter.format({yearData.savingsEndOfYear - props.initialInvestment - yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year}) ({props.initialInvestment + yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year})
) } export default Results;
